title: Create a professional product photo
prompt: Create a high-end commercial product photo of an item in the image: perfectly upright, three-quarter view, fully visible, floating slightly above a pure white background. Use studio composite lighting (soft fill + directional highlights) with controlled HDR-like tonal separation and immaculate edge integrity. No logos, text, or brand-coded elements visible. Deep focus across the product (no background blur). Clean, premium, retouched realism.
